Name: ReThink | Evolved
About the game: ReThink | Evolved is the sequel to the well recieved puzzle-game 'ReThink'. You volunteered to participate in an AI research as part of an human control group. Solve over 50 different puzzles based on logic, the colors of light and movement in two- and three-dimensional space. Use new gameplay mechanics and more player freedom to find creative ways to progress through the game's beautiful world. Feature List More than 50 puzzles Enhanced features and new gameplay elements Freedom of solution - solve puzzles your own way Awesome visuals Your voice matters Feedback from players about the first game was taken into consideration while making this game. In addition to the new gameplay features, game mechanics from the first game were removed or enhanced based on how well they were received by the players. Your feedback about this game will be heard, too!
